kontakt
midi rtp interface using the esp32.
cmos variable state filter
the cd4069 cmos chip is . there are already filter designs with the CD4069. the most popular one is the WASP filter clone from jürgen haible. this filter adds a lot of distortion to the sound.
polivoks
the polivoks filter has very unusual design. It is a filter without capacitors and also does not need to be trimmed. but it is a very screaming filter.
summe
audio and cv mixer that also can add offset or attenuvert a s
cmos filter
this time i want to build filters with the cmos cd 4069.
cmos buffer
this is the first article on a serie about the cd4069 cmos chip. in this article the chip is used as voltage buffer and distortion is analysed for different setups.
